name: hesbon-osoro-portfolio
description: Portfolio website and repository management tools

scripts.manage:repos:dry: node -e "const cfg = require('./manage-portfolio-repos'); cfg.CONFIG = {...cfg.CONFIG, dryRun: true}; new cfg(cfg.CONFIG).run()"
scripts.update:repos: node -e "const Manager = require('./manage-portfolio-repos'); const cfg = {readmePath: require('path').join(__dirname, 'README.md'), projectsBaseDir: 'd:\\Projects', dryRun: false, updateExisting: true, skipErrors: true, username: 'hesbon-osoro'}; new Manager(cfg).run()"
